welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stockton, a charming city known for its beautiful waterfront, vibrant arts scene, and rich agricultural heritage. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Stockton has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Midtown Crêperie & Café
restaurants.description: Midtown Crêperie & Café is a breakfast spot located in Stockton.
restaurants.address: 2319 Pacific Ave (at Tuxedo Ct), Stockton, CA 95204

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
